abstract: Citigroup announced Monday that it has appointed Hamid Biglari as the vice chairman of Citicorp, its collection of desirable businesses like its retail and investment banking operations.
snippet: Citigroup announced Monday that it has appointed Hamid Biglari as the vice chairman of Citicorp, its collection of desirable businesses like its retail and investment banking operations.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup announced Monday that it has appointed Hamid Biglari as the vice chairman of Citicorp, its collection of desirable businesses like its retail and investment banking operations.

headline.main: Biglari  Appointed as Citicorp’s Vice Chairman
